nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify End of Service tab visibility state for offboarded employees
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab or section in employee profile
checks.assertion: Tab should be hidden or disabled for offboarded employees; visible for active employees

checks.description: Verify visual indication of tab unavailability
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab container or parent element
checks.assertion: Tab should display disabled state, greyed out, or hidden when employee is offboarded

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity file month labeling clarity
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity file download interface or report header
checks.assertion: Month identification should be clearly visible and unambiguous in file labels and headers

checks.description: Verify data presentation consistency between profile and exported file
checks.selector_hint: Employee profile gratuity section and downloaded file content
checks.assertion: Month labels and data values should match consistently between profile view and exported file

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify hiring date field state when payroll transactions exist
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date input field in employee profile or admin panel
checks.assertion: Field should indicate if it is editable or disabled based on payroll transaction history

checks.description: Verify error message or constraint notification for hiring date updates
checks.selector_hint: Error message or validation feedback near hiring date field
checks.assertion: System should display clear message explaining why hiring date cannot be modified

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify monthly gratuity report generation options
checks.selector_hint: Report type dropdown or report generation interface
checks.assertion: Monthly gratuity report option should be available or clearly marked as unavailable

checks.description: Verify date range selection for historical gratuity reports
checks.selector_hint: Date range picker or period selection controls in report interface
checks.assertion: Date range controls should support multi-year historical data selection or indicate limitation

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify Gratuity field availability in custom payroll report templates
checks.selector_hint: Custom report template field selector or dropdown
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should be selectable in custom report template configuration

checks.description: Verify gratuity field display behavior in custom reports
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity column or field in downloaded custom payroll report
checks.assertion: Gratuity values should display for EOS-processed employees; zero or empty for non-EOS employees

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify payroll accrual report availability for closed months
checks.selector_hint: Payroll accrual report section or download interface
checks.assertion: Reports should be available for most recent closed cycle; older cycles should be indicated as unavailable or limited

checks.description: Verify month selection interface for accrual reports
checks.selector_hint: Month or cycle selector in accrual report interface
checks.assertion: Interface should clearly show which months have available reports and which do not

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service configuration section
checks.selector_hint: End of Service menu item or configuration link
checks.assertion: Navigation should successfully open End of Service settings or configuration page

checks.description: Verify leave encashment daily wage calculation setting display
checks.selector_hint: Leave encashment calculation method dropdown or radio buttons
checks.assertion: Current setting should be visible and reflect the configured calculation basis (Basic only vs Basic + allowances)

checks.description: Verify End of Service Eligibility section reflects configuration changes
checks.selector_hint: End of Service Eligibility display section
checks.assertion: Eligibility section should display calculation basis matching the configured setting

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify pro-rated EOS amount display precision
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field in End of Service calculation
checks.assertion: Amount should display with correct decimal precision without rounding errors

checks.description: Verify daily wage calculation formula display
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation breakdown or formula display in EOS
checks.assertion: Formula should be visible and correctly applied to pro-rated calculations

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity accrual report column definitions and labels
checks.selector_hint: Column headers in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Column headers should clearly define 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount at end of payroll cycle'

checks.description: Verify column value consistency and clarity
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity accrual report data columns
checks.assertion: Values should be clearly labeled and distinguishable between opening and closing balances

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify EOS tenure calculation display
checks.selector_hint: Tenure or service duration field in End of Service section
checks.assertion: Tenure should be displayed in clear format (years, months, days)

checks.description: Verify unpaid leave deduction visibility in tenure calculation
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave adjustment or deduction display in EOS calculation breakdown
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave days should be shown separately if deducted from total service duration

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify final settlement amount calculation breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Final settlement amount display and component breakdown in EOS
checks.assertion: Settlement breakdown should show all components (gratuity, pro-rated salary, leave encashment, expenses)

checks.description: Verify previously processed payment deductions are visible
checks.selector_hint: Deductions or adjustments section in settlement calculation
checks.assertion: Previously processed payments should be clearly shown as deductions from total

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity accrual opening and closing balance consistency
checks.selector_hint: Opening and closing balance columns in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: Closing balance of one month should match opening balance of next month

checks.description: Verify new hire employee filtering in accrual reports
checks.selector_hint: Employee list or data in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: New hire employees should not appear in accrual reports before their hire date

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation amount display
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in End of Service calculation
checks.assertion: Gratuity amount should be displayed with clear value and calculation basis

checks.description: Verify calculation methodology transparency
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity calculation breakdown or formula display
checks.assertion: System should provide visibility into calculation methodology or formula used

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity report field availability and customization
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity report configuration or field selection interface
checks.assertion: Report should allow selection of standard fields and indicate available/unavailable options

checks.description: Verify days of service field display in gratuity report
checks.selector_hint: Days of service column in gratuity report
checks.assertion: Days of service should be visible or clearly marked as unavailable in report

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify leave calculation method configuration options
checks.selector_hint: Leave calculation method dropdown or configuration controls
checks.assertion: Leave calculation options should be available or clearly indicate current method

checks.description: Verify leave days calculation display in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Leave days field in End of Service calculation
checks.assertion: Leave days should display with clear calculation basis and proration method

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify EOS processed amount display consistency
checks.selector_hint: Processed amount field in EOS tab
checks.assertion: Processed amount should match values displayed in transaction page and payroll table

checks.description: Verify transaction amount consistency across system views
checks.selector_hint: Transaction details in multiple payroll system views
checks.assertion: Same transaction should display identical amounts across EOS tab, transaction page, and payroll table

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify navigation to EOS processing for non-KSA employees
checks.selector_hint: End of Service menu or processing interface
checks.assertion: Navigation should successfully open EOS interface for Qatar and other non-KSA employees

checks.description: Verify gratuity description text for non-KSA employees
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity description or label in EOS interface
checks.assertion: Description should be country-appropriate or generic, not hardcoded to KSA labor law

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify unpaid leave handling options in leave policy configuration
checks.selector_hint: Leave policy configuration or unpaid leave settings
checks.assertion: Option to include/exclude unpaid leave from EOS calculations should be available

checks.description: Verify total service duration display in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Total service duration field in End of Service calculation
checks.assertion: Service duration should display in clear format with unpaid leave adjustments visible

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify navigation from Finance to Payroll table
checks.selector_hint: Finance menu and Payroll table link
checks.assertion: Navigation should successfully open Payroll table from Finance menu

checks.description: Verify End of Service configuration options availability
checks.selector_hint: End of Service section with departure date, reason, and contract type selectors
checks.assertion: All configuration options (departure date, reason, contract type) should be selectable

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation display per UAE labor law
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in End of Service
checks.assertion: Gratuity should be calculated and displayed according to UAE labor law rules

checks.description: Verify non-AED employee gratuity handling
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity field for non-AED currency employees
checks.assertion: Non-AED employees should show 0 gratuity or clear indication of non-eligibility

checks.description: Verify additions and deductions management options
checks.selector_hint: Add/edit additions and deductions interface in EOS
checks.assertion: Interface should allow adding, editing, and reviewing additions and deductions

nav.canonical: Employee Profile > End of Service > Contract Type > Reason for Departure

checks.description: Verify navigation to employee End of Service section
checks.selector_hint: Employee profile and End of Service tab/link
checks.assertion: Navigation should successfully open End of Service section from employee profile

checks.description: Verify End Date selection option
checks.selector_hint: End Date picker or input field in End of Service
checks.assertion: End Date should be selectable with date picker or input control

checks.description: Verify Contract Type selection option
checks.selector_hint: Contract Type dropdown in End of Service
checks.assertion: Contract Type should be selectable from available options

checks.description: Verify Reason for Departure selection option
checks.selector_hint: Reason for Departure dropdown in End of Service
checks.assertion: Reason for Departure should be selectable from available options

checks.description: Verify gratuity calculation based on MOHRE law
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity amount field in End of Service
checks.assertion: Gratuity should be calculated according to MOHRE law based on selected parameters
